pageContext.claim: “Twitter’s horrible what they're doing to people, they’re blanking them out … What’s going on with Twitter is terrible for conservatives.”
pageContext.analysis: Some conservatives and far-right personalities argue that Twitter disproportionately targets conservatives when it enforces its rules. Others say Twitter is acting within its rights as a private company and, research shows, without bias in censoring people such as alt-right leader Richard Spencer and the KKK's David Duke.
